data.description: Present data stored in hashes of arrays
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Data::Presenter offers a variety of methods useful in representing
    data that can be stored in hashes of arrays. It has proved
    particularly useful in preparing data stored in legacy database
    systems for further manipulation by word processing programs. It has
    also proved useful for the construction of small databases where,
    for some reason, a commercial or open source database program is not
    utilized.
